args.name: contentSecurityPolicy
args.defaultValue: default-src 'self' https:; font-src 'self' https: data:; img-src 'self' https: data:; object-src 'none'; script-src https:; style-src 'self' https: 'unsafe-inline'

args.name: preferRejectOnCidrConflict
args.help: When the white-list (allow) and the CIDR of the black-list (deny) conflict, whether the black-list (deny) has a higher priority.

args.name: acceptNotMatchCidr
args.help: The accept the request when neither the whitelist nor the blacklist match.

args.name: anyLocalAddressAllowed
args.help: The allow all local addresses to pass.

childrens.name: allow
childrens.help: The allow or deny IP subnet segments.

args.name: provider
args.help: The which is equivalent to another and condition after match the SPEL expression.

args.name: abort
args.help: The request to abort fault injector configuration.

childrens.name: percentage
childrens.help: The percentage of requests that require fault injection match enabled.

childrens.name: statusCode
childrens.help: The HttpStatus returned when the fault strategy is meet.

args.name: fixedDelay
args.help: The request to fixed delay fault injector configuration.

childrens.name: percentage
childrens.help: The percentage of requests that require fault injection match enabled.

args.name: rangeDelay
args.help: The request to random range delay fault injector configuration.

childrens.name: percentage
childrens.help: The percentage of requests that require fault injection match enabled.

childrens.name: offHeapSize
childrens.help: The number of data size not persisted to keep in memory. must be less than diskSize

childrens.name: diskSize
childrens.help: The number of total data size not persisted to keep in disk. must be greater than offHeapSize
